name: ConvertTransformFile
author: ANTs Developers
description: Utility to read in a transform file (presumed to be in binary format) and output it in various formats. Default output is legacy human-readable text format. Without any options, the output filename extension must be .txt or .tfm to signify a text-formatted transform file.

inputs.name: Input Transform File
inputs.description: Path to the input transform file.

inputs.name: Output Transform File
inputs.description: Path for the output transform file.

inputs.name: Matrix
inputs.description: Output only the transform matrix to a text file, one row per line with space-delimited values. Only works for specific transform types.

inputs.name: Homogeneous Matrix
inputs.description: Output an N+1 square homogeneous matrix from the transform matrix and offset. Only works for specific transform types.

inputs.name: RAS Coordinate System
inputs.description: Convert the output into the RAS coordinate system if combined with 'matrix' or 'homogeneousMatrix'.

inputs.name: Convert to Affine Type
inputs.description: Convert the input transform type to AffineTransform and output again as a binary transform file.
